text:
This enhancement repackages the log4j 1.3 receivers into a log4j 1.2 compatible package.  Primarily 
intended for Chainsaw, but may be useful to others.
creator: carnold@apache.org

text:
Should be functional at rev 528259 if you build a log4j 1.2.x from SVN and push it to your local Maven 
repository as 1.2.15 (copy log4j-1.2.15.jar to ~/.m2/repository/log4j/log4j/1.2.15/log4j-1.2.15.jar and 
copy log4j-1.2.14.pom from ../1.2.14 as change version number both on file name and inside pom).

Source code can be checked out using:

svn co https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/sandbox/log4j/receivers
creator: carnold@apache.org
